00074 #ifndef __STMETRICTREE_H
00075 #define __STMETRICTREE_H

00087 // Class template stMetricTree
00088 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 template <class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
00104 class stMetricTree: public stMetricAccessMethod < ObjectType, EvaluatorType >{
00105    public:
00109       typedef ObjectType tObject;
00110 
00115       typedef EvaluatorType tMetricEvaluator;
00116 
00120       typedef stResult <ObjectType> tResult;
00121 
00130       stMetricTree(stPageManager * pageman):
00131             stMetricAccessMethod < ObjectType, EvaluatorType >(NULL){
00132 
00133          // Common to all Metric trees
00134          myPageManager = pageman;
00135          myMetricEvaluator = new tMetricEvaluator();
00136          sharedMetricEvaluator = false; // Not shared
00137       }//end stMetricTree
00138 
00149       stMetricTree(stPageManager * pageman, EvaluatorType * metricEval):
00150             stMetricAccessMethod < ObjectType, EvaluatorType >(metricEval){
00151 
00152          // Common to all Metric trees
00153          myPageManager = pageman;
00154          sharedMetricEvaluator = true; // Shared
00155       }//end stMetricTree
00156 
00161       virtual ~stMetricTree(){
00162 
00163          if (!sharedMetricEvaluator){
00164             delete myMetricEvaluator;
00165          }//end if
00166       }//end stMetricTree
00167 
00171       stPageManager * GetPageManager(){
00172          return myPageManager;
00173       }//end GetPageManager
00174 
00179       virtual double GetMinOccupation(){
00180          return -1;
00181       }//end GetMinOccupation
00182 
00187       virtual stCount GetMaxOccupation(){
00188          return 0;
00189       }//end GetMaxOccupation
00190 
00197       virtual stCount GetHeight(){
00198          return 0;
00199       }//end GetHeight
00200 
00206       virtual long GetNumberOfObjects(){
00207          return -1;
00208       }//end GetNumberOfObjects
00209 
00215       virtual long GetNodeCount(){
00216          return -1;
00217       }//end GetNodeCount
00218 
00226       virtual stDistance GetDistanceLimit(){
00227          return -1;
00228       }//end GetDistanceLimit()
00229 
00236       virtual stTreeInfoResult * GetTreeInfo(){
00237          return NULL;
00238       }//end GetTreeInfo
00239    protected:
00243       stPageManager * myPageManager;
00244       
00245    private:
00250       bool sharedMetricEvaluator;
00251 };//end stMetricTree
00252 
00253 #endif //__STMETRICTREE_H
